body.name: Leesentec Rugs Modern Non-Slip Soft Area Rugs for Living Room/Bedroom/Dining Room Carpet Floor Mat Home Decorative (Black/Grey, 3'11"×5'3")
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 50 mins
features: 【Stylish and Versatile】This multi-functional area carpet uses a classic color scheme and unique patterns, which make it easily match any decoration and add fashion to your room. A variety of practical sizes make it a charming complement to any place and decoration, such as living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, dormitory, children's room, conference room, etc.

【Premium Soft Material】Our carpets are made of stain-resistant silk velvet, with a soft high-density fluff surface, extra soft and smooth to the touch, which can provide great comfort for your barefoot. The high quality material is very friendly to children and pets, non shedding, no odor. Pets will love to stick on it.

【Upgrade Non Slip Rubber Bottom】Upgraded TPR rubber is used at the bottom of the carpet, which is more anti-skid and will not harm the floor. It is suitable for various floors, such as wood floor, marble floor and ceramic tile floor, to ensure the safety of your family and pets at all times. No additional carpet pads are required.
【Easy Cleaning and Maintenance】We recommend regular vacuum cleaning, spot cleaning with water or mild soap. Professional cleaning if necessary.

【Worry-Free Warranty】Due to the different shooting light and angle, the color of the carpet you receive may be slightly different from the product picture, which is normal. If you have any problem with our rugs within 30 days, please feel free to contact us, we will give you the most satisfactory answer within 24 hours.
body.description: A soft, comfortable and versatile high-quality rug that you deserve Classical, Elegant & Modern Design Design in a vintage unique pattern and classic color scheme, this elegant and beautiful carpet is suitable for most interior decoration. Strong color and exquisite design bring new structure and order to the home, create more possibilities for home decoration, produce a good fusion effect, and perfectly integrate into various places. Premium quality silk velvet rug Soft, plush, and durable indoor rug Fade resistant, stain resistant Pet friendly and kid friendly rug Non-shedding and odorless rug Perfect for high traffic areas like dining room, living room, hallway, bedroom, entryway, kid's room, office

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Introduction The aim of our brand is to create the highest quality, 100% authentic, premium grade kinds of rugs. We work hand in hand with our manufacturers to design the products. We specialize in Bedroom Carpet, Faux Fur Area Rug, Children's Rugs, Faux Fur Blanket, Christmas Party Decoration Area Rug and so on. Unmatched Style Quality Craftsmanship Trusted Brand A soft, comfortable and versatile high-quality rug that you deserve Classical, Elegant & Modern Design Design in a vintage unique pattern and classic color scheme, this elegant and beautiful carpet is suitable for most interior decoration. Strong color and exquisite design bring new structure and order to the home, create more possibilities for home decoration, produce a good fusion effect, and perfectly integrate into various places. Premium quality silk velvet rug Soft, plush, and durable indoor rug Fade resistant, stain resistant Pet friendly and kid friendly rug Non-shedding and odorless rug Perfect for high traffic areas like dining room, living room, hallway, bedroom, entryway, kid's room, office

Why Do You Choose Our Rugs? Comfortable and Durable This rug is made of high-quality Silk velvet and manufactured with reinforced edge technology, which is durable, odorless, non-shedding, soft underfoot and friendly to the touch. A soft high-density fluff keeps the rug flatter and warmer, pets will love lying on it. Anti-slip Bottom Design The anti-slip rug is designed with upgraded TPR rubber on the bottom for enhanced abrasion resistance, so it grips firmly on your floor, staying in place as much as possible and less prone to wear and tear. Ideal for daily indoor high traffic areas. Low Pile Design The area rug features a low pile height, making it ideal in rooms with heavy traffic areas like living room, kids room or landing spaces. Robot Vacuum Cleaner can easily cross the edge and do housework as they running.

Easy to Clean and Care This beautiful carpet is won't stain, fade, and durable. You can vacuum regularly to prevent dust and debris from entering the fiber, or wash it directly with the washing machine, which is very convenient and saves you time and energy. Kid and Pet Friendly Made of high-quality materials and moderate height of fluff, it won't hide stains. This washable rug is very kid and pet friendly. You can play with your kids or pets on the carpet and have a great time. Foldable and Space Saving The soft texture makes it easy to fold this carpet into a small package and deliver it to you faster. At the same time, the folding area carpet is also easier to organize and store, which is convenient for you to use at any time.

Versatile Rug Ideal for placing in crowded place, such as hallways, entryways, doorways, foyers, living rooms, dining rooms, bedrooms, children's rooms, kitchens, in front of sofas or fireplaces, etc.

How To Get A Perfect Size Area Rug？ Option 1 For smaller areas we recommend using a size of 2'7'' × 3'11'' (80×120 cm) or 3'11'' × 5'3'' (120×160 cm). The front of the rug should rest a few inches in front of your sofa. It is also acceptable to place sofas and armchairs on the rug, with only the front legs resting on the rug. Option 2 Larger rooms typically require a rug that is 5'3'' × 6'6''(160×200 cm). Place the front legs of the sofa on top of the rug. You can also place all four legs completely on the carpet surface as well. Leaving 30 cm to 40 cm on all sides of the rug will create a border for your living space. Option 3 If you have king size furniture in a larger space, we recommend 6'6'' × 8'2''(200×250 cm). An equal amount of floor space (between 40cm - 50cm) should be left on all sides if possible. All furniture can be placed completely on the carpet surface without appearing cramped.

Leesentec Black/Grey Rug Leesentec Black/Grey Rug Leesentec Black/Grey Rug Leesentec Black/Grey Rug Available Size 2'7'' × 3'11''(80×120 cm) 3'11'' × 5'3''(120×160 cm) 5'3'' × 6'6''(160×200 cm) 6'6'' × 8'2''(200×250 cm) Versatile Usage Scenarios living room Rug, bedroom rug ,home rug , bed rug , nursery rug , classroom rug ,dorm rug , girls room rug, kids rug and so on. living room Rug, bedroom rug ,home rug , bed rug , nursery rug , classroom rug ,dorm rug , girls room rug, kids rug and so on. living room Rug, bedroom rug ,home rug , bed rug , nursery rug , classroom rug ,dorm rug , girls room rug, kids rug and so on. living room Rug, bedroom rug ,home rug , bed rug , nursery rug , classroom rug ,dorm rug , girls room rug, kids rug and so on. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Blend of Style and Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Leesentec Modern Non-Slip Soft Area Rug for my living room, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. The black/grey design seamlessly blends with my home decor, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication. Not only is it visually appealing, but the softness underfoot is unparalleled. It's evident that this rug is crafted with the utmost care and quality materials.One of the standout features is its non-slip design. I have kids running around all the time, and not once have I had to worry about the rug moving out of place or causing any accidents. It stays put, providing a safe and comfortable space for my family.Cleaning is a breeze too! Spills and stains come off easily, making it perfect for high-traffic areas like the living room and dining room. I've received countless compliments from guests, and I always point them to Leesentec for their impeccable craftsmanship.In conclusion, if you're in the market for a rug that offers both style and functionality, look no further than the Leesentec Modern Non-Slip Soft Area Rug. It's a game-changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and radiant
reviews.reviewText: This carpet feels good, very smooth and soft, the problem is that it is not very heavy, so it is easy to wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty pattern but small and weird polyester type fabric! Cleans easy but I don’t think it’ll last past a year,I’ve had it for about 2 months now!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good carpet i've ever bought.
reviews.reviewText: The carpet is awesome. The surface is smooth and the pattern is pretty good. The size is huge than pictrue and maybe a little bigger than picture.I enjoy this shopping.Hope the shop could sell more and help more people to have this feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The white on the carpet looks pink and at times lavender. The grey is like a pastel purple. Not what I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 1. Not a rug- it’s a piece of very soft fabric 2. It is pink and blue
reviews.reviewText: This feels like a very soft and flimsy piece of polyester velveteen fabric. It has a thin “non slip” backing which will not keep it from sliding around so be prepared to buy rug corners separately. My guess is that the backing won’t hold up after a few washes. The color is also not as depicted in the photos. It has a lot of pink. So if you are looking for a piece of blue, cream, and pink fabric that u can slide around on with a thin coating of rubber that will disintegrate and clog your washing machine drain, this “rug” is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rug is super soft but there is some pink in it. That was a shock to me when it arrived
Es una alfombra, suave al tacto, delgada, tiene un material antiadherente para que no se mueva, el diseño es como en la imagen. Muy bonita. Mi perrito la aprobó.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality, soft and colour is perfect!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price, soft and easy to clean. Works great with my room decor.
Very soft rug, also very thin but does not slip. Happy with purchase.
Super soft, beautiful print, folds up and easy to move. I love this carpet and want more. I didn’t need an underlay
Me gusto mucho la alfombra, está muy bien hecha y es muy cómoda, el diseño está muy bonito y en general estoy muy satisfecho
